ygData.subject: Song Combo for 21st Level
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, First, I solo most of the time and havent used a weapon (except to keep up skill and kill the occasional caster) since getting Denon s Discord.  I use
ygData.messageBody:
Hello,
First, I solo most of the time and havent used a weapon (except to keep up
skill and kill the occasional caster) since getting Denon's Discord. I use
to twist CoD/DDD/Bellow, but my current level (21st), I find the combo of
CoD/DDD/Largo's Binding leaves me a lot more health at the end of a battle.

Is there a better solo song combination (at my level) that I might be
missing? I do kinda like the stares of people standing around as I switch
instruments saying, "That is VERY different way to fight, my friend! Your
singing must be extremely bad to hurt so many, so much!...grin"

PS I'm looking for a good guild on Innorouk for a casual gamer. I am
kinda tired of the solo lifestyle. I define good as FUN, BTW...;)


*******************************************************
Windsinger Legendmaker on Innorouk
Friends are a Bard's Best Defense!
*******************************************************
